name: Solar System (itch) (EboniMiller)
description:
This is a beginners lesson on creating a solar system using Unity. I added the following elements. I used various assets, textures, rotations, materials, various cameras, audio, gizmos, spawners along with 2D and 3D features. 

  1. Sun 

    2.Moon

    3.Earth 

    4.Comets

Credits:Eboni Miller
